data.comment: The match is underway at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lille.
In the minute 2, Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
Nantes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lille push upfield but Willy Delajod quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Lille close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Lille in the half of Nantes.
Corner awarded to Lille.
In the minute 6, Willy Delajod awards the away team a throw-in.
Burak Yilmaz (Lille) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can Lille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nantes's half?
In the minute 8, Ball safe as Nantes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Lille's Burak Yilmaz gets in a shot on goal at Stade Pierre Mauroy. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in Nantes.
In the minute 10, Free kick for Nantes in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Willy Delajod signals a Lille throw-in in Nantes's half.
In the minute 11, Nantes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Nantes in their own half.
Willy Delajod signals a throw-in for Nantes, close to Lille's area.
In the minute 13, Nantes to take a throw-in in Lille territory.
Throw-in for Nantes in the half of Lille.
Fabio of Nantes smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Lille in their own half.
Lille drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Nantes goal kick.
In the minute 19, Nantes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
Lille have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Nantes at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Lille drive upfield and Luiz Araujo gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Nantes defender.
In the minute 24, Lille have been awarded a corner by Willy Delajod.
Lille to take a throw-in in Nantes territory.
Goal kick for Nantes at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
In the minute 26, Throw-in Lille.
Throw-in for Nantes at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Fabio (Nantes) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 27, Can Nantes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lille's half?
Lille have a goal kick.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Lille.
In the minute 29, Willy Delajod awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Lille in the half of Nantes.
Lille are pushing forward but Renato Sanches's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 31, Willy Delajod awards Nantes a goal kick.
Nantes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Willy Delajod signals a Nantes throw-in in Lille's half.
In the minute 32, Ball safe as Lille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball goes out of play for a Nantes goal kick.
Nantes have been awarded a corner by Willy Delajod.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Nantes in their own half.
Can Nantes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lille's half?
Nantes push forward at Stade Pierre Mauroy and Imran Louza gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Lille defence.
In the minute 35, Can Lille capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nantes's half?
Ball safe as Nantes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Nantes in their own half.
In the minute 36, Free kick Nantes.
Willy Delajod awards Lille a goal kick.
Nantes advance rapidly upfield but Willy Delajod blows for offside.
In the minute 38, In Lille Nantes drive forward through Randal Kolo Muani. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
Corner awarded to Lille.
In the minute 41, Nantes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Lille at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
In the minute 43, Lille drives forward and Luiz Araujo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Own goal in Lille! Nicolas Pallois scores in his own net to make it 1-0.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The first half has been concluded at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
In Lille, Lille push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Nantes's Ludovic Blas gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Lille defender.
In the minute 47, Attention is being given to Lilleâ€™s Renato Sanches and play has been suspended briefly.
Renato Sanches is back on his feet again.
Willy Delajod signals a Lille throw-in in Nantes's half.
In the minute 51, In Lille a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Lille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Nantes in the half of Lille.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Lille in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Nantes close to the penalty box.
Willy Delajod awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 56, Nantes to take a throw-in in Lille territory.
Nantes pushes forward through Moses Simon, whose finish on goal is saved.
Nantes have been awarded a corner by Willy Delajod.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Nantes in the half of Lille.
Throw-in Lille.
Nantes have a goal kick.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Nantes at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
In Lille, Jonathan David of Lille is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Willy Delajod awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Nantes in their own half.
Lille awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Nantes in their own half.
In the minute 64, Jonathan Ikone is replacing Jonathan David for Lille at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Nantes will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Lille.
Important block from the Nantes defence as Jonathan Ikone fires in a strike for Lille.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Lille in the half of Nantes.
Corner awarded to Nantes.
Nantes push forward at Stade Pierre Mauroy and Fabio gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Lille defence.
In the minute 68, Nantes have been awarded a corner by Willy Delajod.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
Free kick for Nantes in their own half.
In the minute 70, Lille drive into the zone and Jonathan Bamba is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
Jonathan Bamba (Lille) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
Nantes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 72, Abdoul Kader Bamba is on a sub for Marcus Coco for Nantes.
In the minute 74, Lille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Lille to take a throw-in in Nantes territory.
Nantes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 76, Imran Louza for Nantes drives towards goal at Stade Pierre Mauroy. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Nantes.
Corner awarded to Nantes.
In the minute 77, Imran Louza gets his shot on target but fails to score for Nantes.
Can Nantes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lille's half?
Christophe Galtier is making the team's second substitution at Stade Pierre Mauroy with Boubakary Soumare replacing Renato Sanches.
In the minute 78, Christophe Galtier (Lille) is making a third substitution, with Isaac Lihadji replacing Luiz Araujo.
Willy Delajod signals a Lille throw-in in Nantes's half.
Nantes to take a throw-in in Lille territory.
In the minute 81, Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
Lille have been awarded a corner by Willy Delajod.
Lille have been awarded a penalty...
In the minute 85, Dennis Appiah for Nantes has been booked by Willy Delajod and receives a first yellow card.
Goal! Burak Yilmaz extends Lille's lead from the spot. They now lead 2-0.
Lille needs to be cautious. Nantes have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 88, Mehdi Abeid is replacing Imran Louza for the away team.
Nantes have been awarded a corner by Willy Delajod.
In the minute 89, Nantes's Renaud Emond is on target but unsuccessful.
The away team have replaced Ludovic Blas with Renaud Emond. This is the third substitution made today by Christian Gourcuff.
Free kick for Nantes in their own half.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Nantes.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in high up the field for Nantes in Lille.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lille.
In Lille a free kick has been awarded the home team.
That's full-time at Stade Pierre Mauroy. The final score is 2-0.
The home team replace Benjamin Andre with Xeka.
Lille make their fifth substitution with Yusuf Yazici replacing Burak Yilmaz.
Nantes's Andrei has been booked in Lille.
